alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sierra County through 500 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles east of Engle, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes
